nodes.id: 中国人民解放军海军军医大学第一附属医院

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军军医大学第一附属医院
华东军区人民医学院附属医院
上海军医大学附属医院
中国人民解放军第二军医大学附属医院
中国人民解放军第二军医大学第一附属医院

description.zh-cn: 位于上海市杨浦区的一所三级甲等医院，隶属于中国人民解放军海军军医大学。
description.en: A Grade-A Tertiary hospital located in Yangpu District, Shanghai, affiliated with the Naval Medical University of the People's Liberation Army.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军海军军医大学

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军军医大学

description.zh-cn: 2017年由第二军医大学与海军医学研究所合并调整组建的中国人民解放军高等教育院校。
description.en: A higher education institution of the People's Liberation Army, formed in 2017 by the merger and reorganization of the Second Military Medical University and the Naval Medical Research Institute.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第二军医大学

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军军医大学的前身之一。
description.en: One of the predecessors of the PLA Naval Medical University.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军军医大学的前身之一。
description.en: One of the predecessors of the PLA Naval Medical University.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军军医大学第一附属医院（上海长海医院）现任院长。
description.en: Current Dean of the First Affiliated Hospital of the Naval Medical University (Shanghai Changhai Hospital).

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军军医大学第一附属医院（上海长海医院）现任政治委员。
description.en: Current Political Commissar of the First Affiliated Hospital of the Naval Medical University (Shanghai Changhai Hospital).

description.zh-cn: 中国内地对医院实行“三级六等”的划分等级中的最高等级。
description.en: The highest level in the 'three levels and six grades' classification system for hospitals in mainland China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第三野战军于1949年5月为攻占上海市而进行的战役。
description.en: A military campaign launched in May 1949 by the Third Field Army of the People's Liberation Army to capture the city of Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾在中国东部地区设立的大军区。
description.en: A former military region of the People's Liberation Army located in eastern China.

description.zh-cn: 曾任华东军区人民医学院附属医院（上海长海医院前身）院长。
description.en: Former Dean of the Affiliated Hospital of East China Military Region People's Medical College (predecessor of Shanghai Changhai Hospital).

description.zh-cn: 曾任上海军医大学附属医院（上海长海医院前身）院长。
description.en: Former Dean of the Affiliated Hospital of Shanghai Medical University (predecessor of Shanghai Changhai Hospital).

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国人民解放军第二军医大学第一附属医院（上海长海医院）院长。
description.en: Former Dean of the First Affiliated Hospital of the Second Military Medical University (Shanghai Changhai Hospital).

description.zh-cn: 大上海计划中的一部分，其旧址现为上海长海医院的影像楼。
description.en: Part of the Greater Shanghai Plan, its former site is now the imaging building of Shanghai Changhai Hospital.

description.zh-cn: 1930年代中华民国上海市政府实施的一项大型城市规划。
description.en: A large-scale urban plan implemented by the Shanghai Municipal Government of the Republic of China in the 1930s.

description.zh-cn: 大上海计划中的一部分，其旧址现为上海长海医院内的中国人民解放军第二军医大学校史陈列馆。
description.en: Part of the Greater Shanghai Plan, its former site is now the historical exhibition hall of the Second Military Medical University within Shanghai Changhai Hospital.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军海军军医大学第一附属医院

description.zh-cn: 1949年7月，华东军区将接管的联勤第二总医院组建为华东军区人民医学院附属医院，即上海长海医院的前身。
description.en: In July 1949, the East China Military Region established the Affiliated Hospital of the People's Medical College of the East China Military Region from the taken-over Second General Hospital of the Combined Services, which was the predecessor of Shanghai Changhai Hospital.

relationships.target: 华东军区

description.zh-cn: 上海战役的结束使得华东军区得以接管位于上海的联勤第二总医院。
description.en: The end of the Shanghai Campaign enabled the East China Military Region to take over the Second General Hospital of the Combined Services located in Shanghai.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军海军军医大学第一附属医院
relationships.target: 第二军医大学

description.zh-cn: 自1951年7月起，医院隶属于第二军医大学，直至2017年该大学重组。
description.en: From July 1951, the hospital was subordinate to the Second Military Medical University until the university's reorganization in 2017.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军海军军医大学第一附属医院
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军海军军医大学

description.zh-cn: 2017年，随着第二军医大学重组为海军军医大学，医院改隶属于海军军医大学。
description.en: In 2017, as the Second Military Medical University was reorganized into the Naval Medical University, the hospital became subordinate to the Naval Medical University.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军海军军医大学

description.zh-cn: 2017年，第二军医大学与海军医学研究所合并调整组建为海军军医大学。
description.en: In 2017, the Second Military Medical University merged with the Naval Medical Research Institute to form the Naval Medical University.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军海军军医大学

description.zh-cn: 2017年，海军医学研究所与第二军医大学合并调整组建为海军军医大学。
description.en: In 2017, the Naval Medical Research Institute merged with the Second Military Medical University to form the Naval Medical University.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军海军军医大学第一附属医院
relationships.target: 三级甲等医院

description.zh-cn: 1993年，医院被第一批评为三级甲等医院。
description.en: In 1993, the hospital was among the first batch to be rated as a Grade-A Tertiary Hospital.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军海军军医大学第一附属医院
relationships.target: 西安市

description.zh-cn: 1969年9月随第二军医大学调驻西安市，1975年8月迁回上海。
description.en: In September 1969, the hospital relocated to Xi'an with the Second Military Medical University and moved back to Shanghai in August 1975.

relationships.target: 上海市立博物馆

description.zh-cn: 上海市立博物馆是大上海计划的一部分。
description.en: The Shanghai Municipal Museum was part of the Greater Shanghai Plan.

relationships.target: 中国航空协会大楼

description.zh-cn: 中国航空协会大楼是大上海计划的一部分。
description.en: The China Aviation Association Building was part of the Greater Shanghai Plan.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军海军军医大学第一附属医院

description.zh-cn: 上海市立博物馆旧址现为上海长海医院的影像楼。
description.en: The former site of the Shanghai Municipal Museum is now the imaging building of Shanghai Changhai Hospital.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军海军军医大学第一附属医院

description.zh-cn: 中国航空协会大楼旧址现为上海长海医院内的中国人民解放军第二军医大学校史陈列馆。
description.en: The former site of the China Aviation Association Building is now the history exhibition hall of the Second Military Medical University within Shanghai Changhai Hospital.
